verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:44
verses.text: Thou also hast delivered me from the strivings of my people, thou hast kept me to be head of the heathen: a people which I knew not shall serve me.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:45
verses.text: Strangers shall submit themselves unto me: as soon as they hear, they shall be obedient unto me.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:46
verses.text: Strangers shall fade away, and they shall be afraid out of their close places.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:47
verses.text: The Lord liveth; and blessed be my rock; and exalted be the God of the rock of my salvation.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:48
verses.text: It is God that avengeth me, and that bringeth down the people under me,
